item.title: [HELP]/[REP++] - Exception in Bluurrs, soon as u make an account you disconnet
item.dc:creator: @adventurescape adventurescape
item.description:
@adventurescape wrote:

ok, get another client, open blurrs scape client.java and the other clients client.java look at the difference, what do you see?

item.title: [HELP]/[REP++] - Exception in Bluurrs, soon as u make an account you disconnet
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:278592”]Well, first of all, this is an issue with the client, not the server…

Server = What you play
Client = What you play on

the client.java in the Server != the client.java in the Client.[/quote]
he didnt have that pic posted here when i was telling em… thats why i said it… but yea dude the cache was broken… try finding skittles385’s client and copy that cache over. ONLY IF IT IS FOR 317!!.. there will be parts that wont copy but for the most part it should help it…

EDIT: make sure u backup the old one as well incase it doesn work

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]/[REP++] - Exception in Bluurrs, soon as u make an account you disconnet
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Well, first of all, this is an issue with the client, not the server…

Server = What you play
Client = What you play on

the client.java in the Server != the client.java in the Client.
